price: 他们没有熟思真言呢？还是没有降临他们的祖先的经典已降临他们呢？
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُواْ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: afalam yaddabbarū al-qawla am jāahum mā lam yati ābāahumu al-awalīna
